snippet.title: Kingdom Two Crowns: Call of Olympus | Announcement Trailer | Wishlist Now!
snippet.description:
Call of Olympus is the next major expansion for the beloved side-scrolling co-op micro strategy game: Kingdom Two Crowns. Coming 2024, Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2736340/Kingdom_Two_Crowns_Call_of_Olympus/ 

In faraway lands, Mount Olympus stands tall among the islands, casting an eerie shadow of unease. As a solitary monarch you are setting out on a journey at the dawn of a new day. Mediterranean warmth touches your skin as you slowly ride through dark woods and along beaches with glittering turquoise waters. You have arrived in divine lands where the gods’ presence is palpable, but will it protect you against the Greed attacking at night? 

 
Stay in touch with us and the latest updates from the Kingdom team: 

Twitter - https://twitter.com/kingdomthegame 
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/kingdomthegame/ 
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/kingdomthegame 
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@kingdomthegame 
Discord - https://discord.gg/zndghPS2Qw
